title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-1.7 - Prohibited installations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-1.7 - Prohibited installations

State Regulations

No person shall knowingly install a defective boiler or
boiler component. Standard boilers and components shall be presumed free from
defects unless the contrary shall be established by competent evidence or
determined by a certified boiler inspector after inspection. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
4-1.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
